INSERT INTO  Restaurant SET name = 'Dar Poeta', location = St_GeomFromText("POINT (12.4684635 41.8914114)")


INSERT INTO  test_load_province SET  fid = 'points.3' , the_geom = St_GeomFromText("POINT (11.2819149 43.7658372)") 


INSERT INTO  Restaurant SET  name = 'points.3' , location = St_GeomFromText("POINT (11.2819149 43.7658372)") 


CREATE class test_load_point
CREATE PROPERTY test_load_point.fid STRING
CREATE PROPERTY test_load_point.the_geom EMBEDDED OPoint



CREATE CLASS test_create_class_a
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.id LONG
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.name STRING
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.rank SHORT
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.price INTEGER
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.account FLOAT
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.total_accout DOUBLE
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.birthday DATE;
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.create_time DATETIME;
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_a.active BOOLEAN;



INSERT INTO test_create_class_a SET id=1, name='张三', price=100, rank=1

INSERT INTO test_create_class_a SET id=3, name='王五', price=100, rank=3, account=12.0, total_accout=123456789.1, birthday='2018-11-17', create_time='2018-11-17 12:11:00', active=true



INSERT INTO test_create_class_a SET active=aa


select expand(properties) from (
   select expand(classes) from metadata:schema
) where name = 'test_create_class_b'

INSERT INTO test_create_class_b SET  feature_id = 'points.1' , the_geom = St_GeomFromText("POINT (8.6739416 45.46838)")  , osm_id = '172072' , name = 'Novara' , type = 'motorway_junctio'


CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_b.feature_id STRING
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_b.the_geom EMBEDDED OPOINT
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_b.osm_id STRING
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_b.name STRING
CREATE PROPERTY test_create_class_b.type STRING


select *,ST_Distance_Sphere(the_geom,ST_GeomFromText('POINT(12.4696635 41.8894657)')) as distance from test_create_class_e where ST_Distance_Sphere(the_geom,ST_GeomFromText('POINT(12.4696635 41.8894657)')) < 200 order by distance


12.4696878,41.8894485


http://api.map.baidu.com/marker?location=12.4696878,41.8894485&title=我的位置&content=百度奎科大厦&output=html&src=webapp.baidu.openAPIdemo

select ST_GeomFromText("POINT (12.4684635 41.8914114)")

select *,ST_Distance_Sphere(the_geom,ST_GeomFromText('POINT(12.4696635 41.8894657)')) as distance from test_create_class_e where ST_Distance_Sphere(the_geom,ST_GeomFromText('POINT(12.4696635 41.8894657)')) < 200 order by distance

select iso_3166_2,gn_name,region,geonunit from test_create_class_f where ST_Contains(the_geom, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(12.42617 42.21952)')) = true
